segments.text: Well , I am wondering if we took a hang-out for a drink or something . You know , I just came back from a really tough interview . I was quite nervous during the interview . I really want to have the job . Right now , I am still a little on the edge . I am not sure if I could convince them during the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Take it easy . It is all over now . How was it going , anyway ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don â€™ t know . I think I did well in the paper exams . I was prepared to answer a lot of questions , but they didn't ask those as I expected . To my surprise , the manager tried to talk about the Chinese poesy with me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's strange . But probably , it is the new interview technique they call it ' Getting to know you more personally ' . What about your answers ?
segments.speaker: S2
